title: Add logo to header, landing page, and app icon

requirements.summary: Display the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) in the header/navigation bar
acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears in the header/navigation area
Logo is appropriately sized for the navigation bar
Logo is visible on all pages with the header

file_operations.description: Copy the uploaded logo image-1.png to the public assets directory so it can be accessed as a static asset

Add a header/navigation bar component that displays the logo image from frontend/public/assets/image-1.png. Position the logo prominently in the navigation area with appropriate sizing (height around 40-48px). Ensure the header appears on all pages by placing it above the main content area.

requirements.summary: Display the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) on the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears on the landing page
Logo is prominently displayed and appropriately sized

file_operations.description: Add the logo image from frontend/public/assets/image-1.png to the top of the cases list view as a hero/branding section. Display the logo prominently above the search bar and case grid with appropriate sizing (larger than header, e.g., 120-160px height) and centered alignment.

requirements.summary: Set the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) as the app icon/favicon
acceptanceCriteria: Icon is properly formatted for browser display
Multiple favicon sizes are generated for different contexts (16x16, 32x32, etc.)

file_operations.description: Reference the generated favicon at 16x16 size from frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-16x16.dim_16x16.png as a static asset
Reference the generated favicon at 32x32 size from frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-32x32.dim_32x32.png as a static asset
Reference the generated favicon at 192x192 size from frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-192x192.dim_192x192.png as a static asset
Reference the generated favicon at 512x512 size from frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-512x512.dim_512x512.png as a static asset

Add favicon link tags to the HTML head referencing the generated favicon files at frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-16x16.dim_16x16.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-32x32.dim_32x32.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-192x192.dim_192x192.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-512x512.dim_512x512.png. Include appropriate rel attributes (icon, apple-touch-icon) and sizes attributes for each favicon size to ensure proper display across different browsers and contexts.

requirements.summary: Save the uploaded logo image (image-1.png) as a static asset in frontend/public/assets
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is stored as a static asset
Logo file is accessible via public path

file_operations.description: Store the uploaded logo image-1.png in the frontend/public/assets directory as a static asset that can be referenced throughout the application
